page.title: 16SHOPPING IN BROCKWORTH
page.content: { There is one main shopping area}in Court Road in the centre of Brockworth,and other minor ones on the Abbotswood Estate,at Ermine Park roundabout,and at Usk Way.There is also a busy general store open most hours on Ermin St. However,many families shop in Gloucester at the supermarkets and large stores for their bulk supplies.Brockworth shops provide the following: Coop.stores-groceries and provisions Chemist; Chinese takeaway; Chip shop; Post Office-groceries,provisions,meats Hardware store and DIY shop; Bank; Solicitor's office; Building Society; Hairdressers;Haberdashers;Deep Freeze; Engineering accessories. {SHOPPING HABITS}- The average family of 4 spend about Â£50 per week on groceries.Most popular buys are:bread, potatoes,tinned veg.& steak,chicken.
